project.name: Jamaican Bobsled Team
project.description: Help the first Jamaican bobsled team fund their trip to the Winter Olympics
project.plans: Buy sled and tickets to the Winter Olympics
project.rewards: Help train members of the team

project.name: Bring the Sonics Back
project.description: Petition for the NBA to bring back the Seattle SuperSonics
project.starters: The Glove, Shawn Kemp, Ray Allen
project.plans: Build a new stadium to replace Key Arena
project.rewards: Help train members of the team, get placed in a raffle for courtside season tickets

project.name: The Mighty Ducks
project.plans: Raise money for hockey gear and training facility
project.rewards: See the bash bros beat the Russians
